description: The Keymaster's Index System for instant AI agent onboarding

WORKFLOWS.description: Workflow patterns, orchestration, automation, AI optimization, infrastructure, data processing, ETL, streaming, batch processing, data validation, data transformation, file processing, testing, deployment, performance, caching, profiling, load testing, API design, REST, GraphQL, gRPC, webhooks, pagination, logging, tracing, metrics, UI automation, Selenium, Playwright, Cypress, visual regression, message queues, notifications, scheduling, unit testing, integration testing, mocking, fixtures, E2E testing, contract testing, mutation testing, coverage, lazy loading, connection pooling, backpressure, throttling, compression, agent communication, IPC, file IPC, request/response, pub/sub, state synchronization, DAG, orchestration, choreography, pipeline, correlation IDs, dead letter queue, polling, actor model, CSP

TOOLS.description: Development tools, MCP servers, automation scripts, deployment tools, observability, CI/CD, Docker, Kubernetes, Terraform, Ansible, Grafana, Prometheus, Apache Airflow, Apache Kafka, Elasticsearch, Redis, RabbitMQ, Nginx, Vault, silent installation, enterprise deployment, Group Policy, Autopilot, code signing, notarization, auto-update, package managers, network deployment, compliance scanning

AGENTS.description: AI agent contexts, coordination protocols, messaging (DC, VSCC, TERMC, WEBC, KALIC, CMDC)

SECURITY.description: Security patterns, input validation, SQL injection prevention, secrets management, encryption, AES, TLS, OAuth, JWT, RBAC, CORS, CSRF, API security, secrets rotation, audit logging, SIEM, WORM, input sanitization, zero trust, penetration testing

PROJECTS.description: Project-specific contexts (PhiWave, PhiGEN, PhiVector, PhiSHRI) and system onboarding (000START)

ARCHITECTURE.description: System architecture, design patterns, distributed systems, microservices, event-driven, serverless, event sourcing, Saga pattern, CQRS, Factory, Singleton, Observer, Strategy, Decorator, Adapter, Builder, Proxy

ERRORS.description: Error patterns, troubleshooting, solutions, timeout handling, retry, circuit breaker, database errors, network errors, validation errors, serialization errors, race conditions, memory errors, configuration errors

examples.827HHWINC#: Tools category, Windows MCP file operations

getting_started.first_time_users: Read CONTEXTS/PROJECTS/000START.json - your entry point to the door system
getting_started.documentation: Read HOW_TO_USE.md for complete navigation guide
getting_started.quick_reference: Door codes are semantic: D05=deployment, W115=messaging, S05=secrets, R09=patterns
